page.title: 13DEEPING ST.JAMES DOG KENNELS
page.content: The dog kennels were established about 16 years ago.Before that it was the station hotel owned by the Watney Mann Brewery,and before that it was the Manor of Deeping Wake.The owner said he has only got records going back to 1806 although the building seems to be much older than that. The Joseter kennels are well known for breeding cardigan corgies.The owner has had them since he was young and likes them because they have a pl- easant temperament. Cardigan Corgies come in different shades such as red and white, red brindle, brindle and white, black and white, sable,blue merle, and tricolour. At the Joseter kennels they also breed four other types of dogs. They are Bichon Frise, Boston Terriers,Welsh Corgies,and Boxers.
